p: Incubation period of rotavirus diarrhea has been estimated to be <48 h though it varies from 1 to 4 days. Duration of virus excretion ranges from 4 to 57 days. In 43 % of children, viral excretion stops in 10 days of onset of diarrhea, and in 70 % of children, it stops within 20 days, while in 30 % of children, virus may be detected in stool for 25–57 days.
